column4: I created a Cron Job by using sudo crontab -e and wrote * * * * * /home/user/myfile.sh in it. In my shell script i perform an SCP. but even though i do this the crontab does not seem to transfer
I followed a tutorial which suggested to run via a sudouser
dont use sudo in front of all commands. if you want to run the script as your user dont use sudo
